marklogic.body: Getting VERY concerned about my tix to see Mastodon/Opeth on May 7 at The Brick. Concerned as in "I wonder if anyone will be unaware enough to buy them Off of me?" It's not even goodwill I care about at this point, it sounds like they need to completely gut the place and rebuild. I'm too old for the pit at the front of the stage (i.e. the only place to actually see the band), and it sounds like I need to get there a day early for the few Spots on the balcony.
